alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:31PM CDT until June 05 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTY... At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just5 east of Potwin, or 9 miles northwest of El Dorado, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Potwin and El Dorado State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
